questions.text: Was Tom Hanks in this movie?
options: He was only in a cameo
questions.explanation: Tom Hanks provided the voice for Woody, the pull-string cowboy doll who is Andy's favorite toy.

questions.text: What was Buzz Lightyear's main problem?
options: He thought he was a real space ranger
questions.explanation: Buzz Lightyear didn't realize he was a toy - he genuinely believed he was a real space ranger from Star Command.

questions.text: What happened when Sid's dog Scud attacked?
options: Woody and Buzz fell out the window
questions.explanation: Scud's attack caused Woody and Buzz to fall out of the window into Sid's yard, beginning their adventure.

questions.text: How did Woody and Buzz escape Sid's room?
options: They scared Sid so much he left
questions.explanation: The toys came to life and scared Sid so badly that he ran away and never returned to terrorize toys again.

options: He was a real space ranger
questions.explanation: When Buzz tried to fly and fell with style instead, he finally realized he was just a toy, not a real space ranger.

questions.text: Was Idina Menzel in this movie?
options: She was only in a cameo
questions.explanation: Idina Menzel provided the voice for Elsa, the Snow Queen with ice powers who sang 'Let It Go'.
Elsa's real power was creating life - she created Olaf and Marshmallow, living beings made of snow and ice.

questions.text: What happened to Anna at the end?
options: She was saved by an act of true love
questions.explanation: Anna was saved by an act of true love - sacrificing herself for Elsa rather than taking care of herself first.

questions.text: What was the real act of true love?
questions.explanation: The act of true love was Anna sacrificing herself for Elsa, which broke the curse - love between family, not romance.
Prince Hans was the villain - he tried to kill Elsa to become king and left Anna to die from the frozen heart curse.

questions.text: Was this a Studio Ghibli movie?
questions.explanation: Spirited Away was produced by Studio Ghibli and directed by Hayao Miyazaki, becoming the first non-English film to win Best Animated Feature.

questions.text: What was Chihiro's real name in the spirit world?
questions.explanation: Chihiro's name was changed to Sen by Yubaba, who takes away part of a person's name to control them and make them forget their identity.
Chihiro's parents ate food meant for the spirits without permission and were transformed into pigs as punishment.
Haku was a river spirit, the spirit of the Kohaku River, who forgot his identity after the river was paved over and built on.

questions.text: How did Chihiro save her parents?
options: She identified her parents from all the pigs
questions.explanation: Chihiro had to identify her parents from all the other pigs, which she did correctly, winning their freedom and returning them to human form.
